reviews.text: Came to write a review of how amazing the food was and saw a not so truthful review so I'll write about both! I came in with my boyfriend on September 3,...

Don't recommend at all service is so bad and slow.
Waited 10 minutes after we sat down just to get water.
BBQ grille flame is so low take hour to cook meat...
Pretty standard KBBQ restaurant in Columbus. I came here a few times and food has been overall pretty good. There are a few tables with grills for a cook...
